title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Attempt to click on the first Combo.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not receive the focus. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
EB: The first Combo, labeled 'Host:', should receive the focus when clicked upon.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Photon application.
2. Locate the first Combo labeled 'Host:'.
3. Click on the Combo.
